root.name: Linux Bash Shell Scripting with Real Life Examples
root.description: This course is design for those who have some experience in Linux and want to learn or refine their Linux shell scripting skills.  Most of the scripts practiced in this training are based on real life examples.For the hobbyists this is fun to do, for the aspiring Linux system admins these are essential skills and for the experienced Linux engineers these are skills to be consolidated In this training we will cover the following:
